column4: Hello ... how do I change the way Gnome shows me the ALT-TAB windows? I don't want a screenshot ... I want a simple list of open programs
ï»¿Hello ... how do I change the way Gnome shows me the ALT-TAB windows? I don't want a screenshot ... I want a simple list of open programs
Weird, I don't think I have compiz installed? I thought it was metacity, right
System > Preferences > Appearance ... default is to use Compiz.
